Activities

Lena Henningsen to Present at the 2024 IÜD Showcase in Heidelberg on 3 July

19 June 2024

ChinaComx PI, Lena Henningsen, will present on the realm of translating Chinese comics at the ShowCase Dolmetschwissenschaft Live at the Institut für Übersetzen und Dolmetschen (Institute for Translation and Interpreting) at Heidelberg University, in the Konferenzsaal II at Plöck 57A, on 3 July.

The talk is titled “LIANHUANHUA (连环画): CHINESE COMICS IN TRANSLATION AND IN TRANSCULTURAL PERSPECTIVE” and will be at 14:15. For direct access to the Zoom stream, click here.

The conference will be simultaneously translated into seven languages—English, French, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, and Spanish—so even if you’re not familiar with German, do tune in! Click here for the conference poster and program.
